evs.gui.utilities
Class DisplayReferencePar

java.lang.Object
  evs.gui.utilities.DisplayReferencePar

public class DisplayReferencePar
extends java.lang.Object

Class for storing and displaying a reference forecast in a combo box.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

setRefFcsts

public void setRefFcsts(java.lang.String[] refs)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Sets the reference forecasts, removing the default status of none available and removing the current index selection. Throws an exception if two or more reference identifiers are the same.

Parameters:
refs - the reference forecasts
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
